item.title: Australia, Singapore, and the UAE are among the top 10 destinations on people's relocation wishlist
item.description:
A recent report by Hydrogen Group, a global recruitment firm, reveals a growing trend of professionals seeking international work opportunities. The study found that the number of individuals open to working abroad doubled over a five-year period, rising from 16% in 2010 to 35% in 2014. Furthermore, 40% of respondents believe there are no obstacles to relocating for work. While the US and UK were the most popular destinations, followed by Australia, Singapore ranked as the most preferred Asian country at seventh place...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/australia-singapore-and-the-uae-are-among-the-top-10-destinations-on-people-s-relocation-wishlist/

item.title: Who Needs A T1 Line at Home?
item.description:
T1 lines are famous for their reliability and accessibility wherever there’s telephone service, but they might not be suitable for everyone’s home broadband needs. The cost alone is a major deterrent for most people. However, in some situations, a T1 line might be the only practical option. Residential broadband prioritizes affordability to reach a broad market. That’s why DSL services can cost under $20 monthly, and Cable broadband with 3 to 6 Mbps typically costs $30 to $40...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/who-needs-a-t1-line-at-home/

item.title: Solarwinds is advocating for the recognition of IT personnel on September 15th as IT Professionals Day
item.description:
SolarWinds, a company that provides software for managing hybrid IT infrastructures, has declared the third Tuesday of September (starting on September 15, 2015) as IT Professionals Day. This day is meant to show appreciation for IT professionals, recognizing their often-unsung contributions to modern businesses. To mark IT Professionals Day, SolarWinds published the findings of their IT Pro Value Survey. This research highlights the significant contributions of Singaporean IT professionals. It examines how much end-users value IT departments and explores how valued IT professionals feel within their organizations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/solarwinds-is-advocating-for-the-recognition-of-it-personnel-on-september-15th-as-it-professionals-day/
